details.text: Welcome to the boot camp, recruit! My name is General Cyrus, and I will be your instructor today. Pay attention and you might even survive a day on a real battlefield!
details.name: General Cyrus

details.text: Let us start with getting familiar with moving your forces around. In front of you, there is an Infantry unit waiting for your orders.
details.name: General Cyrus

details.text: Select your unit, and you will see possible movement tiles highlighted. An Infantry unit has 4 Movement Points (MP) available to it, so once these are used up, you need to end your turn by holding the Y button. You can tell, that a unit used up all their MP, when unit changes it's appearance to grey colours.
details.name: General Cyrus

details.text: Try moving your unit around. Once you familiarize yourself with giving orders, move your unit onto a blue tile next to a building in the woods.
details.name: General Cyrus
